translator_notes: 脂砚斋 (Zhiyan Zhai) was one of the earliest and most important commentators on Dream of the Red Chamber, believed to have been closely connected to the author Cao Xueqin
脂评 (Zhiping) refers to the commentary tradition attributed to Zhiyan Zhai and other early manuscript commentators (畸笏叟, etc.)
汇校本 indicates this is a collated edition combining multiple manuscript sources (甲戌本, 庚辰本, 己卯本, etc.)
This v3.13 edition (2009) represents modern scholarly work collating various historical manuscripts
research_notes: Verified standard translations of the title: 'Dream of the Red Chamber' (most common English), 'Сон в красном тереме' (Russian standard), '紅楼夢' (Japanese using same kanji)
Researched Zhiyan Zhai's role as early commentator and possible relative of Cao Xueqin
